SEARCH
Package org.example

Class ExpressionParser

java.lang.Object
org.example.ExpressionParser
public class ExpressionParser extends Object
Parses and evaluates the given expression for a cell in a spreadsheet.

    • evaluate

      public double evaluate(SpreadSheet s, String expression, Cell currentCell) throws Exception
      Evaluates the given expression and updates the current cell with the result.
      Parameters:
      s - The spreadsheet.
      expression - The expression to evaluate.
      currentCell - The current cell to update.
      Returns:
      The result of the evaluation.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during evaluation.

    • infixToRPN

      public String infixToRPN(String infixExpression, SpreadSheet spreadSheet)
      Converts an infix expression to Reverse Polish Notation (RPN).
      Parameters:
      infixExpression - The infix expression to convert.
      spreadSheet - The spreadsheet associated with the expression.
      Returns:
      The RPN representation of the infix expression.

    • preprocessFormula

      public String preprocessFormula(String formula)
      Preprocesses the formula by identifying and replacing basic operations.
      Parameters:
      formula - The original formula.
      Returns:
      The processed formula with basic operations replaced by their computed results.
